SELECT distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.another_name, m.menu_description, m.menu_type_id, m.icon, m.menu_order, m.create_time, m.status, m.update_time FROM nt_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN nt_sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN nt_sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN nt_sys_role ro ON ur.role_id = ro.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_type_id=#{menuTypeId} AND m.status='1'
AND menu_name LIKE concat('%', #{menuName}, '%')
ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.menu_order

SELECT m.id FROM nt_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN nt_sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.menu_type_id=#{menuTypeId} AND m.id NOT IN ( SELECT m.parent_id FROM nt_sys_menu m INNER JOIN nt_sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id AND rm.role_id = #{roleId}) ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.menu_order
